title: Update: Straight Outta Compton’s F. Gary Gray confirmed as Furious 8 director
text:
Update: Straight Outta Compton’s F. Gary Gray confirmed as Furious 8 director 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
The next installment of the Fast and the Furious franchise will be directed by Straight Outta Compton filmmaker F. Gary Gray, who confirmed ... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
